casebody.data:
PEOPLE of State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Dakota Lee SHORTER, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 158177
COA: 338629 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 8, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of the Michigan Coalition to End Domestic & Sexual Violence and End Violent Encounters, Inc., to file a brief amicus curiae is GRANTED. The amicus brief submitted on August 3, 2018, is accepted for filing.
